product_name: REI Fleet Running Shorts - Men's 6" Inseam
long_description: REI Fleet Running Shorts with a 6" inseam feature performance fabrics that let you comfortably keep to your training schedule. These shorts feature a 4-way-stretch polyester/spandex blend that's soft and dries quickly. The fabric also provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Stretchy crepe liner shorts wick moisture away from body to keep you comfortable; fabric in liner shorts is recycled. Elastic waistband with drawcord fine-tunes the fit. 2 mesh-lined hand pockets; zippered lumbar pocket features a sweat-resistant skin-side lining to keep cash, a key and a credit card dry. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light. REI Fleet Running Shorts with a 6" inseam offer an athletic fit that moves with you.
short_description: REI Fleet Running Shorts with a 6" inseam feature performance fabrics that let you comfortably keep to your training schedule.
